item.title: * Lock
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

How can I possibly change myself if I’m getting burnt by people dressed in a soldier outfit.
Fuck this topic, I can’t post anything I come up with without getting flamed by assholes.

[color=red][size=95pt]END OF CONVERSATION[/size]

Be glad I’m quiting programming cuz it’s just one less person you have to flame out of hundreads.

Read full topic

item.title: * Lock
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:23, topic:365699”][quote author=John459 link=topic=461900.msg3380152#msg3380152 date=1287957562]
You made a separate class just for generating a random number? Why the fuck would you ever do that?
[/quote][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=461900.msg3380140#msg3380140 date=1287956846]

[/quote][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=461900.msg3379954#msg3379954 date=1287947909]

I’m not passing around this small 30-50 lines program that people need to understand every bit of it.
Nobody can post without flame in these forums, and that’s the truth.

Well if you’re not going to release it, then you’re doing it for practice. And if you’re doing it for practice you need to break out of bad habits so that when you do release something people can actually work with it.
[/quote][quote author=John459 link=topic=461900.msg3380102#msg3380102 date=1287954354]
What is this

misc.random(500);

[/quote][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=461900.msg3380108#msg3380108 date=1287954457]

What is this

misc.random(500);

This ^
[/quote][quote author=`Alec link=topic=461900.msg3379889#msg3379889 date=1287944832]

Lol…Although I don’t know Usman that well, he has his own server. Showing that he has some experience with coding. This is not the most difficult coding in the world. It’s 40 lines. Besides, it’s a damn guessing game lol, it’s not even a application. There isn’t a copyright on TheNewBoston’s coding.

It’s only bad when he doesn’t give credit, and claims it is his because he changed the method’s names.

[/quote][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=461900.msg3379804#msg3379804 date=1287939818]
Your naming conventions are so beautifully perfect, good job.
http://geosoft.no/development/javastyle.html#Naming%20Conventions
[/quote]And you tell me to relax.[/quote]

It’s just a thread with opinions. Opinions that might actually help you progress throughout your programming experiences. You should be thanking the ladies and gentlemen that had posted.

Read full topic

item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

class misc:

public class misc { public static int random(double sides) { // 0 till range (range INCLUDED) return (int) (java.lang.Math.random() * (sides + 1)); } }
I just extended the flame I recieve.
